name: Irish Colleges - Website Page Title
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Irish Colleges in the websites Page Title
query: ((page_title:"Trinity College Dublin" AND NOT resolved_domain:tcd.ie) OR (page_title:"University College Dublin" AND NOT resolved_domain:ucd.ie) OR (page_title:"Dublin City University" AND NOT resolved_domain:dcu.ie) OR (page_title:"Technological University Dublin" AND NOT resolved_domain:tudublin.ie) OR (page_title:"University College Cork" AND NOT resolved_domain:ucc.ie) OR (page_title:"University of Galway" AND NOT resolved_domain:universityofgalway.ie) OR (page_title:"Maynooth University" AND NOT resolved_domain:maynoothuniversity.ie) OR (page_title:"University of Limerick" AND NOT resolved_domain:ul.ie) OR (page_title:"Munster Technological University" AND NOT resolved_domain:mtu.ie) OR (page_title:"South East Technological University" AND NOT resolved_domain:setu.ie) OR (page_title:"Royal College of Surgeons in Ireland" AND NOT resolved_domain:rcsi.com) OR (page_title:"National College of Ireland" AND NOT resolved_domain:ncirl.ie) OR (page_title:"Griffith College in Ireland" AND NOT resolved_domain:griffith.ie) OR (page_title:"Mary Immaculate College" AND NOT resolved_domain:mic.ul.ie) OR (page_title:"Marino Institute of Education" AND NOT resolved_domain:mie.ie) OR (page_title:"Institute of Art, Desgin and Technology" AND NOT resolved_domain:iadt.ie) OR (page_title:"National College of Art and Design" AND NOT resolved_domain:ncad.ie))

name: Irish Colleges - Possible Phishing
description: Returns discovered websites which reference Irish Colleges in the websites Page Title
query: (dom:"Trinity College Dublin" AND (dom:login OR dom:studentid AND (dom:password OR dom:portal OR dom:signin)) AND NOT resolved_domain:tcd.ie)

name: Irish Colleges - Staff Infostealers
description: Returns discovered infostealer activity targeting Irish university domains
query: domain:(tcd.ie OR ucd.ie OR dcu.ie OR tudublin.ie OR ucc.ie OR universityofgalway.ie OR maynoothuniversity.ie OR ul.ie OR mtu.ie OR setu.ie OR rcsi.com OR ncirl.ie OR griffith.ie OR mic.ul.ie OR mie.ie OR iadt.ie OR ncad.ie) OR username:(@tcd.ie OR @ucd.ie OR @dcu.ie OR @tudublin.ie OR @ucc.ie OR @universityofgalway.ie OR @maynoothuniversity.ie OR @ul.ie OR @mtu.ie OR @setu.ie OR @rcsi.com OR @ncirl.ie OR @griffith.ie OR @mic.ul.ie OR @mie.ie OR @iadt.ie OR @ncad.ie)
